verses.verse: A <S%H8605>Prayer<s%> of the <S%H6041>afflicted,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> he is <S%H5848>overwhelmed,<s%> and <S%H8210>poureth<s%> out his <S%H7879>complaint<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> my <S%H8605>prayer,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and let my <S%H7775>cry<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to you.

<S%H5641>Hide<s%> not your <S%H6440>face<s%> from me in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when I am in <S%H6862>trouble;<s%> <S%H5186>incline<s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%> to me: in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when I <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H6030>answer<s%> me <S%H4118>speedily.<s%>
For my <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H3615>consumed<s%> like <S%H6227>smoke,<s%> and my <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H2787>burned<s%> as an <S%H4168>hearth.<s%>
My <S%H3824>heart<s%> is <S%H5221>smitten,<s%> and <S%H3001>withered<s%> like <S%H6212>grass;<s%> so that I <S%H7911>forget<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> my <S%H3899>bread.<s%>
By reason of the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H585>groaning<s%> my <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H1692>stick<s%> to my <S%H1320>skin.<s%>
I <S%H1961>am<s%> <S%H1819>like<s%> a <S%H6893>pelican<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness:<s%> I <S%H1961>am<s%> like an <S%H3563>owl<s%> of the <S%H2723>desert.<s%>
I <S%H8245>watch,<s%> and am as a <S%H6833>sparrow<s%> <S%H909>alone<s%> on the house <S%H1406>top.<s%>
My <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H2778>reproach<s%> me <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day;<s%> and they that are <S%H1984>mad<s%> against me are <S%H7650>sworn<s%> against me.
For I have <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H665>ashes<s%> like <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and <S%H4537>mingled<s%> my <S%H8249>drink<s%> with <S%H1065>weeping.<s%>
<S%H6440>Because<s%> of your <S%H2195>indignation<s%> and your <S%H7110>wrath:<s%> for you have <S%H5375>lifted<s%> me up, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> me down.
My <S%H3117>days<s%> are like a <S%H6738>shadow<s%> that <S%H5186>declines;<s%> and I am <S%H3001>withered<s%> like <S%H6212>grass.<s%>
But you, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> shall <S%H3427>endure<s%> for <S%H5769>ever;<s%> and your <S%H2143>remembrance<s%> to all <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
You shall <S%H6965>arise,<s%> and have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on <S%H6726>Zion:<s%> for the <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H2603>favor<s%> her, <S%H3588>yes,<s%> the set time, is <S%H935>come.<s%>
For your <S%H5650>servants<s%> take <S%H7521>pleasure<s%> in her <S%H68>stones,<s%> and <S%H2603>favor<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> thereof.
So the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> your <S%H3519>glory.<s%>
<S%H3588>When<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H1129>build<s%> up <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> he shall <S%H7200>appear<s%> in his <S%H3519>glory.<s%>
He will <S%H6437>regard<s%> the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of the <S%H6199>destitute,<s%> and not <S%H959>despise<s%> their <S%H8605>prayer.<s%>

<S%H2088>This<s%> shall be <S%H3789>written<s%> for the <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H314>come:<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> which shall be <S%H1254>created<s%> shall <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H3050>LORD.<s%>
For he has <S%H8259>looked<s%> down from the <S%H4791>height<s%> of his <S%H6944>sanctuary;<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%> did the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5027>behold<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%>
To <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H603>groaning<s%> of the <S%H615>prisoner;<s%> to <S%H6605>loose<s%> those that are <S%H1121>appointed<s%> to <S%H8546>death;<s%>
To <S%H5608>declare<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and his <S%H8416>praise<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%>
When the <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H6908>gathered<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> and the <S%H4467>kingdoms,<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
He <S%H6031>weakened<s%> my <S%H3581>strength<s%> in the <S%H1870>way;<s%> he <S%H7114>shortened<s%> my <S%H3117>days.<s%>
I <S%H559>said,<s%> O my <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H5927>take<s%> me not away in the <S%H2677>middle<s%> of my <S%H3117>days:<s%> your <S%H8141>years<s%> are throughout all <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
Of <S%H6440>old<s%> have you laid the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> and the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> are the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

They shall <S%H6>perish,<s%> but you shall <S%H5975>endure:<s%> yes, <S%H3605>all<s%> of them shall wax <S%H1086>old<s%> <S%H1819>like<s%> a <S%H899>garment;<s%> as a <S%H3830>clothing<s%> shall you <S%H2498>change<s%> them, and they shall be <S%H2498>changed:<s%>
But you are the <S%H1931>same,<s%> and your <S%H8141>years<s%> shall have <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H8552>end.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of your <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall <S%H7931>continue,<s%> and their <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall be <S%H3559>established<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you.
